body_html:
Q: Have I written custom code
Answer: NO

Q: OS Platform and Distribution
Answer: What? (confused) Windows 10 Education

Q: TensorFlow installed from
Answer: C:> conda create -n tensorflow pip python=3.6 (more)

Q: TensorFlow version
Answer: 1.7.0

Q: Bazel version
Answer: not install, Does non-gpu tensorflow version need it ?

Q: CUDA/cuDNN version
Answer: My laptop does not have GPU
Does non-gpu tensorflow version need it ?

Q: GPU model and memory
Answer: My laptop does not have GPU
Does non-gpu tensorflow version need it ?

Q: Exact command to reproduce
C:> conda create -n tensorflow pip python=3.6

C:> activate tensorflow
(tensorflow)C:> # Your prompt should change

(tensorflow)C:> pip install --ignore-installed --upgrade tensorflow

// Above three steps perfect ! However, start idle, and

import tensorflow as tf
Error (Details at top)

I hope get your solution ASAP !

body:
Q: Have I written custom code          
Answer: NO

Q: OS Platform and Distribution       
Answer: What? (confused)  Windows 10 Education

Q: TensorFlow installed from            
Answer:  **C:> conda create -n tensorflow pip python=3.6**  ([more](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows))

Q: TensorFlow version
Answer:   1.7.0

Q: Bazel version
Answer:  not install, Does **non-gpu tensorflow** version need it ?

Q: CUDA/cuDNN version
**Answer: My laptop does not have GPU**  
Does **non-gpu tensorflow** version need it ?

Q: GPU model and memory
**Answer: My laptop does not have GPU** 
Does **non-gpu tensorflow** version need it ?


Q: Exact command to reproduce
**C:> conda create -n tensorflow pip python=3.6**

**C:> activate tensorflow
 (tensorflow)C:>  # Your prompt should change**

**(tensorflow)C:> pip install --ignore-installed --upgrade tensorflow** 

// Above three steps perfect ! However, start idle, and 
>>> import tensorflow as tf
Error (Details at top)

**_I hope get your solution ASAP !_**
